overall.description: Broadcast an array to a new shape.

shape.description: The shape of the desired array.

subok.description: If True, then sub-classes will be passed-through, otherwise the returned array will be forced to be a base-class array (default).

broadcast.description: A readonly view on the original array with the given shape. It is typically not contiguous. Furthermore, more than one element of a broadcasted array may refer to a single memory location.
